df = pd.read_csv("C:/Users/Frank/Downloads/x.csv")
print("df.shape=",df.shape)
print("list(df.columns)=",list(df.columns))

print("df.info()=",df.info())

print("df.sort_values(by='Salary', ascending=False)",df.sort_values(by='Salary', ascending=False))
print("df.groupby('Team')['Salary'].mean()",df.groupby('Team')['Salary'].mean())
